definition: extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: Saw the rest several later on live, indeed as expected, you all the way kill into 5 strong.
sentences.chinese: 隨後看了餘下的幾場直播，果然，你一路殺進5強。

sentences.english: Ross: All right, so I don't know what sycophant means, but the rest is right.
sentences.chinese: 那我不知道“拍馬屁”的意思，但餘下的是對的。

sentences.english: He spends the rest of the book describing how to survive without one.
sentences.chinese: 本書餘下的篇幅裏描述了沒有車該如何生存。

sentences.english: Cut the remaining half chorizo and bacon into slices and lay them on top.
sentences.chinese: 餘下半份香腸和煙肉切片，鋪上表面。
餘下的就都進了方的腰包。

sentences.english: Like the rest of us, Koreans live in interesting times.
sentences.chinese: 就像餘下的我們，朝鮮人生活在一個有趣的時代。

sentences.english: Filling the remaining modest gap in concerned-parents' control can hardly be a compelling state interest.
sentences.chinese: 填補餘下的小漏洞不能說是州政府的迫切利益。

sentences.english: Actuarial gains and losses are recognised over the average remaining service lives of employees.
sentences.chinese: 精算收益及虧損於僱員的平均餘下服務年期內確認。

sentences.english: And the only things left in the castle were Darkness and the Red Death.
sentences.chinese: 城堡中只餘下黑暗和紅死魔，此外別無一物。

sentences.english: Next, you need to fill in the remaining cells.
sentences.chinese: 接下來，需要填充餘下的單元格。

sentences.english: He never used the full-court press the same way again.
sentences.chinese: 在餘下的賽季，他再也沒那樣使用全場緊逼。

sentences.english: Finally, a ridge is formed around the tree trunk with the remaining soil.
sentences.chinese: 最後，把餘下的土在樹幹周圍培埂。
第6章會討論餘下的步驟。

sentences.english: What remains, in ChengDu, I have only one thing to do.
sentences.chinese: 餘下來的，在成都，我就只有一件事可以做了。

sentences.english: The town sits on toxic waste from a century ofsmall-scale mining.
sentences.chinese: 這個城市座落在一百年前的小礦餘下的有毒廢料周圍。

sentences.english: I thought you weren't talking to me for the rest of your life?
sentences.chinese: 我認爲你不會跟我談你餘下來的生活吧？
